juzs.text: 15|1|Arifu ramu ra. Kore wa Keisuke no shirushi de, mago kata nai kuruan no shirushidearu.
15|2|Shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, jibun-tachi ga musurimudeattanaraba to, nozomu toki ga 屢 々 Arou.
15|3|Kare-ra o honin shi, tabe sase tanoshima sete,(hakanai) kibo ni madowa sete okuga i. Mamonaku kare-ra wa satorudearou.
15|4|Ware wa don'na machi o horobosu baai demo, sadame rareta kigen ga yattekita toki ni soshita.
15|5|Dare mo sono jiki o hayame, mata okurasu koto wa dekinai.
15|6|Kare-ra wa iu. `Kunkai ga keiji sa reta mono yo, hontoni anata wa tsuka reta monodearu.
15|7|Moshi anata (no iu koto) ga shinjitsudearunaraba, naze tenshi o tsurete konai no ka.'
15|8|Ware wa, sorenari no riyu ni yoru igai ni wa tenshi o tsukawasanai. So nareba, kare-ra wa yuyo sa renai nodearu.
15|9|Hontoni ware koso wa, sono kunkai o kudashi, kanarazu sore o shugo suru nodearu.
15|10|Ware wa anata izen no, mukashi no sho shudan ni mo tashikani (shito-tachi o) noko wa shita.
15|11|Daga shito-tachi ga kare-ra no moto ni kuru tabi ni, kare-ra ni yotte chosho sa renai mono wa nakatta.
15|12|Kono yo ni ware wa, tsumibukaimono no kokoro ni,-so suru koto o shinobikoma seta.
15|13|Mukashi no mono-tachi e no senrei ga atta no ni, kare-ra wa kono (keiji) o shinjinai.
15|14|Tatoe ware ga kare-ra no tame ni ten no mon o aite,(zuiji) kare-ra o nobora seyou to shite mo,
15|15|Kare-ra wa kanarazu,`watashi-tachi no me wa hontoni kurande shimatta. Iya watashi-tachi wa mahonikakerarete iru.' To iudearou.
15|16|Ware wa ten ni seiza o sadamete miru mono ni utsukushiku nagame sase,
15|17|mata, norowareta subete no akuma kara mo sorera o mamoru.
15|18|Daga nusumigiki suru mono wa betsu de, kare wa magai no nai hono (ryusei) ni oikake rareru.
15|19|Mata ware wa daichi o Shin be hirogete, yamayama o sono-jo ni kengo ni suetsuketa. Sokode subete no mono o (datona) kinko no shita ni, seicho sa seru.
15|20|Ware wa anata gata no tame ni mo, mata anata gataga kesshite yoiku-sha tari e nai mono ni mo seikei no michi o ataeta.
15|21|Do no yona monode mo, ware ni sono (mujin no) takuwae no nai mono wanai. (Hitsuyo ni 応 Shita) ittei no bunryo igai ni wa kudasanai dakedearu.
15|22|Mata ware wa hoyoku ni suru kaze o okuri, ten kara ame o fura sete, sore o anata gata ni noma seru. Daga anata gata wa sono (hoko no) kanrishade wanai.
15|23|Hontoni ware wa, anata gata o ikashi, mata shina seru. Ware wa mata sozoku-shadearu.
15|24|Ware wa anata gata no naka de sossen suru mono o, shitte iru. Mata okure o toru mono mo, shitte iru.
15|25|Anata no omo wa, kare-ra o (shinpan no hi ni) issei ni shoshu nasa reru. Hontoni kare wa eimei ni shite zenchi de ara reru.
15|26|Hontoni ware wa jinrui o, doro de katachidzukutte todo kara tsukutta.
15|27|Mata ware wa sakini moesakaru hono kara kasoke Tadashi 〔Jin〕 o tsukutta.
15|28|Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni mukatte ose rareta toki o omoe. `Hontoni ware wa ningen o doro de katachidzukutte, todo kara tsukurou to suru nodearu.
15|29|Ware wa kare o (kanzen ni) katachidzukutta. Sorekara ware no rei o kare ni fukikomi nda toki, anata gata (tenshi) wa kare ni sajida shi nasai.' To (meijita).
15|30|Sore de tenshi-tachi wa, iburisu o nozoki issei ni sajida shita.
15|31|Kare wa issho ni sajida suru koto o kyohi shita.
15|32|Kare wa ose rareta. `Iburisu yo, anata ga issho ni sajida shinakatta no wa nazeka.'
15|33|Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi ni wa anata ga doro de katachidzukuri, todo kara o tsukuri ni natta ningen ni sajida suru yona koto wa, dekimasen.'
15|34|Kare wa ose rareta. `Sorenara anata wa koko kara sagare. Hontoni anata wa, norowa rete iru.
15|35|Kono noroi wa, hontoni shinpan no hi made anata no ue ni arou.'
15|36|Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, kare-ra ga yomigae sa reru hi made, watashi o yuyo shite kudasai.'
15|37|Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata wa yuyo sa reru,
15|38|sadame rareta toki no (sono)-nichi made.'
15|39|Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo anata wa, watashi o mayowa sa remashitanode, watashi wa chijo de kare-ra ni (mayoi o) konomashiku omowa se, kanarazu kare-ra subete o, mayoi ni ochira semashi yo.
15|40|Kare-ra no naka de seijitsuna (onkei ni yori kiyome rareta) anata no shimo be no soto wa.'
15|41|Kare wa ose rareta. `Kono (kenkyode seijun'na waga shimo be no) michi koso, ware e no tadashi michidearu.
15|42|Anata (iburisu) ni shitagatte, jado ni soreru yona mono o nozoki, ware no shimo be (shinja) ni kanshite wa, anata wa kare-ra no ue ni nani no ken'i o motanai.
15|43|Hontoni jigoku koso, kare-ra subete no mono ni yakusoku sa reru bashodearu.
15|44|Soreni wa 7tsu no mon ga ari, onono no mon ni wa, kare-ra (tsumibito) no ichidan ga wariate rareru nodearu.'
15|45|Hontoni omo o osoreru mono wa, izumi no aru rakuen ni hairu.
15|46|(Kare-ra wa aisatsu sa reyou. ) `Anata gata wa, heian ni kokoro yasuraka ni koko ni o-iri.'
15|47|Ware wa kare-ra no mune ni aru kakawari o nozoki,(kare-ra wa) kyodai to shite koi no neisu no ue ni taiza suru.
15|48|Sokode wa tsukare aki koto naku, mata (eien ni) soko kara owa reru koto mo nai.
15|49|Ware no shimo be-tachi ni,`ware wa hontoni, kan'yode jihibukai monodeari,
15|50|ware no chobatsu wa, hontoni tsukuna chobatsudearu.' To tsuge shirase nasai.
15|51|Sore kara, iburahimu no hinkyaku no koto ni tsuite kare-ra ni katare.
15|52|Kare-ra (hinkyaku no 2 tenshi) ga, kare no tokoro ni haitte kite,`heian'are.' To aisatsu shita toki,`watashi-tachi wa, anata gataga, kowaidesu.' To itta.
15|53|Kare-ra wa itta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Watashi-tachi wa rikona 1-ri no musuko ga 授Ru kippo o, anata ni motarashita noda.'
15|54|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa sudeni rorei ni tasshite iru no ni, anata gata wa watashi ni kippo o kudasaru no ka. Ittai anata gata ni nani no kippo ga arou ka.'
15|55|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, shinri ni yotte kippo o anata ni tsutaeru. Dakara shitsubo shite wa naranai.'
15|56|Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Mayotta-sha no soto wa, dare ga omo no o jihi ni zetsubo shimashou ka.'
15|57|Kare wa (mata) itta. ` (Omo no) shito no kata gata yo, anata gata (ga ko rareta tokoro) no yoken wa, nanideshou ka.'
15|58|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni noko wa sa reta.
15|59|(Daga) ruto no ichizoku wa betsudearu. Watashi-tachi wa, kare-ra no zen'in o kanarazu sukuudearou.
15|60|Daga watashi-tachi no kakunin shite iru kare (ruto) no tsuma wa betsu de, ka no on'na wa haigo ni nokoru hitobito no hitoridearu.'
15|61|Sorekara shito-tachi ga ruto no ichizoku no moto ni kita toki,
15|62|kare wa itta. `Anata gata wa, minarenai kata gatadesu.'
15|63|Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi wa kare-ra no utagai o daite iru koto ni kanshite, anata no tokoro ni kita nodearu.
15|64|Watashi-tachi wa shinri o motarashita. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, shinjitsu o tsugeru.

15|65|Sorede yoru no akenai ma ni, anata no kazoku to issho ni tabidachi nasai. Soshite anata wa mina no ichiban-go kara tsuite iki, anata gata no dare mo ushiro o furimuka sete wa naranai. Tada, meiji rareta tori ni jikko shi nasai.'
15|66|Ware ga kono kettei o kare ni shiraseta no wa, nokotta korera no (tsumibukai)-sha-tachi o (yoku) asa horobosu tamedearu.
15|67|Machi no jumin-tachi wa,(wakamono no nyusu o kii te) yorokobi ni karitate rarete yattekita.
15|68|Kare (ruto) wa itta. `Kono ho gata wa, watashi no hinkyakudesu. Watashi o hajisarashi ni shinaide kudasai.
15|69|Arra o osore, watashi ni haji o kaka senaide kudasai.'
15|70|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, gaikoku no mono (o tomeru koto) o, anata ni kinjinakatta ka.'
15|71|Kare wa itta. `Moshi anata gata ga okonaou to surunara, koko ni watashi no musume-tachi ga imasu.'
15|72|(Yogen-sha yo) anata no seimei ni kakete (chikau). Hontoni kare-ra wa kokoro o ran shite, ate mo naku samayou monodearu.
15|73|Sore de hitokoe (chobatsu) ga, hinode ni kare-ra o osotta.
15|74|Ware wa sono (machi o)-jo o shita ni shite tenpuku shi, yaita doro no ishi o kare-ra no ue ni fura seta.
15|75|Hontoni kono nakaniha chisei aru mono e no, shuju no shirushi ga aru.
15|76|Sono (machi no ato) wa, daido ni sotte nao sonzai suru.
15|77|Hontoni kono nakaniha shinko suru mono e no hitotsu no shirushi ga aru.
15|78|Mata mori no nakama mo fugi o okonau monodeatta.
15|79|Sokode ware wa sore ni hofuku shita. Hontoni kono 2tsu (no ato) wa daido ni sotte,(ima) akiraka (ni mi rareru no)dearu.
15|80|Hijuru no nakama mo shito-tachi o usotsuki to shite kyohi shita.
15|81|Ware wa kare-ra ni waga shuju no shirushi o kudashitaga, kare-ra wa sorera o sake (te mushi shi)ta.
15|82|Kare-ra wa (iwa) yama ni ie o horikomi, anzendearu to kangaete ita.
15|83|Soredearu Cho, hitokoe (chobatsu) ga, kare-ra o osotte,
15|84|kare-ra ga (tokubetsu no chishiki to gijutsu de) kizuki itonande ita koto wa, kare-ra ni totte nani mo yakudatanakatta.

15|85|Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tada shinri ni motodzuite sozo shita. (Shinpan no)-ji wa hontoni kite iru noda. Dakara anata wa nasakebukaku kan'yo ni (hitobito no kashitsu ya ketten o) yurushite yaru ga i.
15|86|Hontoni anata no omo wa, ban'yu o sozo shita zenchi no okata de ara reru.
15|87|Ware wa taezu kurikaesa rerubeki 7tsu (no setsu) to, idaina kuruan o anata ni sazuketa.

15|88|Ano mono-tachi no nan'ninka ni ware ga sazuketa tanoshimi ni taishite urayamashi-so ni shite wa naranai. Soshite sore ni kokoro o itamete wa naranai. Sore yori anata no tsubasa o hikuku (shite yasashiku) shi nasai.
15|89|Soshite itte yaru ga i. `Hontoni watashi wa komeina keikoku-shadearu.'
15|90|(Keiji o katte ni) bunkatsu shita mono ni taishite mo, ware wa keiji shite oita.
15|91|Sunawachi kuruan o (kare-ra no tsugo no yoi yo ni) danpen ni shita-sha-tachi ni mo.
15|92|Sore de, anata no omo ni chikaite, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra subete o jinmon surudearou.
15|93|Kare-ra ga okonatta subete no koto ni tsui te.
15|94|Dakara anata ga meiji rareta koto o sen'yo shi nasai. Soshite tashinkyo to kara tozakare.
15|95|Hontoni ware wa, chosho suru mono ni taishi, anata o jubun ni mamotte yaru.
15|96|Kare-ra wa, arra ni soto no kami o haisuruga, mamonaku shirudearou.
15|97|Ware wa kare-ra no kuchi ni suru koto de, anata no mune ga shimetsuke rareru no o shitte iru.
15|98|Dakara, anata no omo o tataete 唱念 Shi, sajida shite,
15|99|sadame no toki ga otozureru made, anata no omo ni tsukae nasai.
16|1|Arra no meirei wa (kanarazu) kuru. Sore o isoide motomete wa naranai. Kare ni tatae are. Kare hakare-ra ga doto ni haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru.

16|2|Kare wa sono shimo be no naka no, o kokoronikanau-sha ni, kare ga meiji rareta keiji o mota sete, tenshi o noko wa sa re (ko ose rareta). `Ware no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Dakara ware ni anata gata no gimu o hatasu yo kankoku shi nasai.'
16|3|Kare wa shinri ni yotte, ten to ji o sozo nasa reta nodearu. Kare hakare-ra ga doto ni haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru.
16|4|Kare wa 一精滴 Kara ningen o tsukura reta. Shikashi miruga i. Kare (ningen) wa kozen to iron o tonaeru.
16|5|Mata kare wa, kachiku o anata gata (ningen no tame) ni tsukura reta. Anata gata wa, sorera ni yori dan'i ya shuju no ben'eki o e tari, mata sorera o shokuyo to suru.
16|6|Yugata ni sorera o (ie ni) kari modosu toki, mata asa ni (maki-chi e) karitateru toki, anata gata wa sorera ni yasashisa o kanjiru.
16|7|Mata anata gataga mizukara kuro shinakereba tasshi gatai kuni ni, sorera wa anata gata no omoni o hakobu. Hontoni anata gata no omo wa, shinsetsude jihibukai kata de ara reru.
16|8|Mata (kare wa) uma to raba to roba (o tsukura reta). Korera wa anata gata no joyo to kazari no tamedearu. Mata kare wa anata gata no shiranai,(-gai no) iroirona mono o tsukura reta.
16|9|(Tadashi) michi ni hokodzukeru no wa, arra no shigotodearu.Daga magatta michi mo aru. Moshi kare no okokoro ga nozomunaraba, anata gata wa isseini michibika retadearou.
16|10|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame ni ten kara ame o furasu kata de, sore ni yotte anata gata wa nomi, sore ni yotte jumoku wa seicho shi, sore ni yotte bokuchiku suru.

16|11|Kare wa sore de anata gata no tame ni, kokurui to oribu to natsumeyashi to budo sono soto kakushu no kudamono o sodate rareru. Hontoni kono nakaniha, hansei suru min e no shuju no shirushi ga aru.
16|12|Kare wa yoru to hiru, taiyo to tsuki o anata gata no tame ni unko sa seru. Murubushi mo kare no meirei ni fukuju shite iru. Hontoni kono nakaniha, rikai aru mono e no shuju no shirushi ga ari,

16|13|mata kare ga anata gata no tame ni, chijo ni seiiku suru subete no mono o, tayo no shikisai (to seishitsu) ni nasa reru. Hontoni sono nakaniha,(kansha shite) kunkai o ukeireru mono e no hitotsu no shirushi ga aru.

16|14|Kare koso wa, kaiyo o (ningen ni) shieki sa se rareru kata de, sore ni yotte anata-kata wa sengyo o tabe, mata fukushoku ni mochii rareru mono o sore kara tori, mata kare no onkei o motomete, sono naka ni nami o kitte susumu fune o miru. Kanarazu anata gata wa kansha surudearou.
16|15|Mata kare wa, chijo ni yamayama o kengo ni sue rareta. (Soreha) daichi ga anata gata o yuriugokasanai tamedearu. Mata kawa ya michi o tsukura reta. Anata gata ga michibika reru tamedearu.
16|16|Mata iroirona hyoshiki, hoshi o tayori ni kare-ra (hitobito) wa michibika reru.
16|17|Kore demo sozo nasa reta kata ga, sozo shinai mono to kurabe rareyou ka. Soredemo anata gata wa, nao kunkai o ukeirenai no ka.
16|18|Anata gata wa, tatoe arra no onkei o kazoete mo, totei kazoe tsukusu koto wa dekinai. Hontoni arra wa kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
16|19|Arra wa anata gata ga kakusu koto mo, gen wasu koto mo shitte ora reru.
16|20|Kare-ra (fushin-sha) ga, arra o sashioite, inori motomeru mono-tachi wa, nani mo sozo shinai. Shikamo kare-ra (jashin) jishin koso tsukura reta monodearu.
16|21|(Kare-ra wa) shinda monode seimei wanai. Nanji yomigae sa reru kamo shiranai.
16|22|Anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no kami (arra)dearu. Daga raise o shinjinai mono wa, sono kokoro kara shite shirou to sezu, kare-ra wa komandearu.
16|23|Utagai mo naku, arra wa kare-ra no kakusu koto to, gen wasu koto o shitte ora reru. Kare wa koman'na mono o o konomi ni nara renai.
16|24|Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata no omo ga (muhanmado ni) kudasa reta no wa nani ka.' To towa reru toki, kare-ra wa,`mukashi no monogataridesu.' To iu.
16|25|Kare-ra wa fukkatsu no hi ni, jibunjishin'no omoni no zenbu to, chishiki ga nai tame ni, kare-ra ni mayowa se rareta mono no omoni o mo ou. A, kare-ra ga ou mono koso awaredearu.

16|26|Kare-ra izen no mono mo (omo no michi ni taishite iroiro to) sakubo shita. Daga arra wa kare-ra no kozo-mono o, dodai kara kutsugaesa re, yane ga ue kara ochi, chobatsu wa yoso shinakatta homen kara kare-ra ni kudatta.

16|27|Sore bakari ka fukkatsu no hi ni wa, kare-ra ni kutsujoku o atae, kare wa ose rareyou. `Anata ga tagawa reto doto ni hai shita mono wa doko ni iru no ka. Sorera ni tsuite, anata gata wa (shinjinbukai hitobito to) ronso shite itade wanai ka.' Chishiki o atae rarete ita mono wa iu. `Kyo wa, kutsujoku to kutsu ga fushin-sha no ue ni aru noda.

16|28|Jibun no tamashi ga, wareto wagami o gai shite iru ma ni, tenshi ni mesa reta mono ni wa.' Sonotoki fukuju to kie o hyomei shi,`watashi-tachi wa aku o okonatte ita node wa arimasen.' To (itte mo),(tenshi wa) `iya, arra wa anata gataga okonatta subete no koto o shitte ora reru.
16|29|Dakara jigoku no mon o hairi, sono naka ni sumi nasai.'(To iudearou). Koman'na mono no sumai no nanto awarena koto yo.

16|30|(Koe ga atte) omo o osoreta-sha-tachi ni iwa reta. `Omo wa, anata gata ni nani o kudasa reta no ka.' Kare-ra wa (kotaete),`kekkona mono o.' To iu. Zenko o suru mono ni wa gense de yoi koto ga ari, raise no sumai wa sarani yoi. Hontoni omo o osoreru mono no sumai no nanto shiawasedearu koto yo.

16|31|Kare-ra wa, adon (eden) no rakuen ni hairuga, sono-ka ni wa kawa ga nagarete iru. Sono Chu de kare-ra wa, nani demo hoshi mono o erudearou. Arra wa kono yo ni,-nushi o osoreru mono o mukuwa reru.
16|32|Tenshi-tachi ga kiyoi (jotai) de, shina seru mono ni,`anata gata ni heian'are. Anata gata wa jibun no itta (zenko no) kekka, rakuen ni ire.' To iwa reyou.

16|33|Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa, tenshi-tachi ga yattekite (kare-ra no tamashi o hikinuki),-nushi no (shobatsu no) meirei ga kudaru made matsu soto wa nai node wanai ka. Kare-ra izen ni moso no yona mono mo ita. Shikashi arra wa kare-ra o futo ni atsukatta wakede wanai. Daga kare-ra wa jibun jishin o (fushinjin ni yotte) gai shita dakedearu.
16|34|Kare-ra no koi no warui kekka ga kare-ra ni furikakari, izen ni chosho shite ita koto ga, kare-ra o torikakomu.

16|35|Guzo o suhai suru mono-tachi wa iu. `Moshi arra ga o nozominara, watashi-tachi mo mata watashi-tachi no sosen mo, kare o sashioite nanimono ni mo tsukaenakattadearou. Mata watashi-tachi wa kare (no meirei) naku, nanimono o mo kinjinakattadearou.' Kare-ra izen no mono-tachi mo sodeatta. Tsumari shito-tachi (no tsutome) wa, meihakuna (keiji no) senpu no soto ni nani ga arou ka.

16|36|Hontoni ware wa, onono no min ni hitori no shito o noko wa shite `arra ni tsukae, jashin o sake nasai.' To (meijita). Sore de kare-ra no nakaniha, arra no michibika reta mono mo ari, mata, 迷誤 Ga sakerarenai-sha mo atta. Sorede chijo o tabi shite,(shinri o) kyohi shita mono no ato ga don'na monodeatta ka o miruga i.
16|37|Tatoe anata ga kare-ra o michibikou to netsubo shite mo, mayou ni makase rareta mono o, arra wa o michibiki ni nara renai. Kare-ra ni wa enjo-sha wa nai nodearu.

16|38|Kare-ra wa arra ni kakete, tsuyoku sensei shite,`arra wa, kesshite shisha o yomigaera semasen.' To chikau. Kesshite sode wanai. Kore wa kare ga, shinri ni yotte (gimu to sa reta) o yakusokudearu. Daga hitobito no oku wa shiranai.
16|39|(Fukkatsu no hi ni oite) kare-ra (fushin-sha) no iron o tonaeta koto ni tsuki, kare-ra ni meihaku ni shi, mata shinri o kyohi shita mono ni, jibun ga usotsukideatta koto o shiraseru tamedearu.
16|40|Hontoni koto o nozomu toki sore ni taisuru ware no kotoba wa, tada sore ni `are' to iu dake de, tsumari sono tori ni naru nodearu.

16|41|Hakugai sa rete, arra no (michi no) tame ni iju suru mono ni wa, ware wa gense de, kanarazu yoi sumai o ataeru. Daga raise de no hosho koso motto dai naru monodearu. Kore ga moshi kare-ra (fushin-sha) ni wakarunaraba.
16|42|(Kare-ra iju-sha wa) taeshinobi, kare-ra no omo ni sugari kiru monodearu.

16|43|Ware ga anata yori izen ni tsukawashi, keiji o sazuketa no wa (tenshide wanaku) ningen nihokanaranai. Anata gataga moshi wakaranainara, izen ni kunkai (no Keisuke) o atae rarete iru min (Yudaya, kirisutokyoto) ni touga i.
